alert.note: Alert for Divide; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN WILLIAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN DIVIDE COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Grenora, or 31 miles north of Williston, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Williams and southwestern Divide Counties, including the following locations... Appam, Zahl, and Hanks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
